### Evenness {.tabset .tabset-pills}

#### All data points

```{r}
ds_patches %>%
  filter(disturbance == disturbance_input) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = evenness_pielou,
             y = bioarea_per_volume)) +
  geom_point()
```

#### Single treatments & time points {.tabset .tabset-pills}

```{r}
plot_evenness = function(patch_type) {
  print(
    ds_patches %>%
      filter(eco_metaeco_type == patch_type) %>%
      ggplot(aes(x = evenness_pielou,
                 y = bioarea_per_volume)) +
      geom_point() +
      facet_wrap( ~ time_point) +
      labs(title = paste0(
        "Patch type = ",
        patch_type
      ))
  )
}
```

##### S

```{r}
plot_evenness("S")
```

##### M

```{r}
plot_evenness("M")
```

##### L

```{r}
plot_evenness("L")
```

##### S connected to L

```{r}
plot_evenness("S (S_L)")
```

##### L connected to S

```{r}
plot_evenness("L (S_L)")
```
